name: Into Space
description:
Help gods to create worlds by controling gravity fields

Made during the Mini Jam 86 : Sports with the theme No Stopping.

Credits :

  • Baptiste REY, programmer
  • Paul REY, game artist

All the assets, except the sounds and musics, have been made during the jam.

Musics :

  • "The road we use to travel when we were kids" by Komiku
  • "Protect" by MonPlaisir
  • "The Get Away" by Mr Smith
  • "America" by Mr Smith
